1.content: Okay, choice who you want to be
1.title: Choice

11.content: David asked you to come to the science lab with him to see something.
11.title: Going to the Lab

112.content: You walk in and David isn't there. You see a large machine and walk in to check it out when you accidently press one of the buttons. A light flashes and you black out.
112.title: Curiosity shrunk the girl and made her fat.

13.content:
"Sarah, how long is this going to take?" asked David. His girlfriend, Sarah, turned and looked at him as they entered the science lab.

"Not long, David. I just have to check with Henderson about skipping a few classes" she explained.

They then saw some strange, machine.

"What is that?" asked David.

"I don't know: replied Sarah as they went into it.
13.title: Beginning

131.content:
"The hell?" David yelled. There was a flash of light, and both lost consciousness.

David slowly opened his eyes later. He felt different, though. Puffier, or something. He looked over and saw Sarah, and was shocked. She was fat! About 100 pounds or so more. As he looked down, he realized he was as well!

That wasn't all, though. The room looked bigger. They had shrunk!
131.title: Shock

choices: They start to head for the door
They spot some spiders staring at them
1311.content:
Sarah began to awake. She slowly looked at her boyfriend.

"David! You're fat!" she exclaimed.

"Yeath, while look at yourself" he replied.

Sarah looked down at the floor and saw her reflection. Her face was puffy, she had a double chin, her gut was huge and her jeans seemed painted on.

As if that wasn't enough, she then realized they were only a inch tall.
1311.title: Awakening

13111.content:
"What happened?!" Sarah yelled.

"How the hell do I know?" David replied.

They started to head out.
13111.title: Moving on

choices: The spiders continue to chase them.
Sarah's former boyfriend and David's former girlfriend who've been w
13112.content:
David and Sarah see two spiders staring at them. "David tell me we're not on a spider's web." Sorry Sarah, but yes we are on a spider's web." "OH SHIT!" Sarah says as the spiders start getting closer. David and Sarah try to get out of the spiders' web, but the spiders are getting closer and closer and start to show their fangs. Sarah screams and fortunately David is able to break the web and gets Sarah out.

"Where do we go now?" asks Sarah "We go to the Science teacher" says David. They start going and...
13112.title: THE SPIDERS!

choices: Follow Sarah as she's played with at Jen's house.
Follow Joe as he tries to save her.
131122.content:
"Sarah look out!" David screamed as he ran out of the way of his exgirlfriends foot.

He couldn't run very fast but he managed to waddle into a hole in the wall.

Sarah however wasn't so lucky. She tried waddling away but in her thickened state she became tired very quickly. She cursed herself for being fat as she feels her thighs rubbing together. She couldn't believe she was waddling.

Jen, Davids ex-girlfriend picks her up and holds her in her hand.

"Sarah?" she giggles.

"Is that you. What happened? You... you're fat."

Joe, Sarah's ex-boyfriend had an idea.

"Hey why don't we cut class and play with our little piggy at your house."

"That's a great idea."

So Joe and Jen went back to her house to play and make fun of Sarah. Joe is just left there staring.
131122.title: The Ex's

choices: Gains more weight every time she farts or burps...
1311221.content:
"What shall we do with her?" David's ex said.

"We'll shoot her with this!" Sarah's ex said, holding up a syringe. It had Gas-X on the side. He shot it into Sarah's still frame. She screamed but the noise was drowned out by an even longer rumbling in her gut.

PFFFFTTTTTTTT! A tiny fart escaped Sarah. Then a little belch escaped as well. The two started laughing.

"Look at the fat slob!" Sarah's ex said. Sarah started crying. Then her farts got louder and louder! She was growing! Her form got taller and taller and soon she stood before them, a massive fat woman.

"Now you two are going to pay-then Sarah stopped talking and released a massive belch. Sarah's ex came up to her.

"Sorry babe, but this concoction never stops giving you gas. You'll keep on expelling it and not have time to do anything else!" Sarah cried and kept on burping and farting. Then the two left leaving Sarah alone. She farts and then she...
1311221.title: Gas-X

info.brief_description: A devices makes you shrink in size and yet gain weight. A shrinking/WG story
info.description:
Chose between two characters

1. Sarah is an 18-year-old girl and a cheerleader

2. David is an 18-year-old boy and a jock.

Basically, the character will go into the science lab, and accidentally set off a machine that makes them gain weight and shrink.

As for rules:

1. No death.
2. No porno.
3. Try to keep it a non-FA story.
4. Use spell check, correct grammar and punctuation and no all-caps or no-caps.
